DataElement.preferredName: Medical Condition Performed Observation Outcome Condition Status Change Reason OMOP CDM Condition Stop Reason
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Relating to the study or practice of medicine._A state of being, such as a state of health._Executed and carried through to completion._Watching something and taking note of what happens._The result of an action._A state of being, such as a state of health._A condition or state at a particular time._The act of alteration or modification; changed or altered in form or character._An explanation of the cause of some phenomenon or action._The reason that the condition was no longer present, as indicated in the source data.
